name: Snake Bite
description:
A simple and fun way to enjoy an old classic game.

There is a big difference though!!!

This snake will not go side to side, instead it moves in all directions, just like a rotating car.

Are you ready to rotate and navigate this hungry snake and devour all the juicy fruits.

Just how long can you grow? We would love to see your high scores shared with the rest of the world.

Happy Slithering!!!
